Read the details of a particular Answer given its ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  parameters={[]}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","description":"The opaque ID of the Answer.","example":3}},"title":"AnswerId"},{"properties":{"docId":{"type":"string","description":"Glean Document ID of the Answer. The Glean Document ID is supported for cases where the Answer ID isn't available. If both are available, using the Answer ID is preferred.","example":"ANSWERS_answer_3"}},"title":"AnswerDocId"}],"title":"GetAnswerRequest"}}},"description":"GetAnswer request","required":true,"x-exportParamName":"Request"}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
